reviewText: Fantastic series for my eight year old granddaughters - they loved the topics and were keenly interested in them. Well done - great to see a series like this that promotes science to girls in such an interesting and entertaining way.
I wanted my kids to like it. They felt like it was another homework assignment and they won't watch it.
My daughter loves it! Perfect for those parents who want to encourage their girls towards science and technology.

An excellent tween show my kids and I can all agree on.  No obnoxious language, sarcasm or poorly delivered jokes.  Just smart girls doing smart things.  Highly recommend for boys and girls alike (because let's face it -- boys seeing smart girls doing smart things will only ever be a good thing!) for multiple ages.
